DescriptionData.Title: Disposable Nitrile Gloves, Exam Gloves Blue Latex-Free Powder-Free for Factory Workshops Vehicle Maintenance Tattoo Hairdressing Beauty Salons
DescriptionData.Description:
★ The density of the pinholes of the gloves is greatly improved,the toughness is stronger,and long nails are not afraid.
★ Welcome to LDGHL shop, thank your presence and trust! You can click on our shop to see more products.
★ We will continue to update Disposable Gloves provide customers with quality products.

★ Specification
- Item Type: Disposable Gloves
- Color: Blue
- Material: Nitrile

★ Package List:
- 100 Pcs/Box

★ Note
- This product is only for sale of Disposable Gloves, other accessories are not included in the scope of sale, please pay attention when purchasing.
- Because of the light effect and the different computer monitors, there may be the color difference.
- Different measurement methods or tools, the size error is about 1-2cm
- Please trim your nails before wearing. Too long or sharp nails can easily cause damage to gloves.
- When wearing, please wear with the belly of your fingers to avoid gloves falling off
- When removing gloves, turn up the gloves on your wrist and remove them to your fingers
- If you have any questions about these Disposable Gloves, please feel free to contact us and we will reply you email and solve your problem in 24h.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ★ HIGH TOUGHNESS: The density of the pinholes of the gloves is greatly improved,the toughness is stronger,and long nails are not afraid.
★ FINGERTIP ANTI-SLIP DESIGN: Micro-numbed surface at fingertips,good non-slip grip, and improved operation sensitivity.
★ FLEXIBLE AND COMFORTABLE: Gloves are not easy to drop, which is convenient and flexible.
★ PULL-RESISTANT: It is full of material, slightly elastic, thickened for upgrading, and not easy to stick.
★ CUSTOMERS SERVICE: If you have any questions about these Disposable Gloves, please feel free to contact us and we will reply you email and solve your problem in 24h.
DescriptionData.SearchTerms: Disposable Gloves Food Grade Examination Powder Multifunction Reusable Latex Comfortable Wear Ambidextrous Hands Puncture Resistance Textured Nitrile Rubber Non-Toxic Household Cleaning Hygiene Inspection Handling Automotive Tattoo Applications
